channel.title: features on Hello! I'm Olivier
channel.description: Recent content in features on Hello! I'm Olivier

item.title: Elements showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

item.title: Cover image showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: Tranquilpeak integrate a unique “cover image” feature. Open this post to see how this feature sublimate your article.

item.title: highlighted code showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: Tranquilpeak Hugo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

item.title: Hidden social section showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the social section is hidden.

item.title: Hidden tag section showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the tag section is hidden.

item.title: Hidden pagination showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the pagination is hidden.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.author: o.lamarre7 [at] gmail [dot] com (Olivier Lamarre)
item.description: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.

item.title: 中文測試

item.description: This is a chinese test post to show you how chinese is displayed.
